node.name: Twitter-Bot
node.description: This Twitter Bot will follow all users following your account and favorite, retweet, follow and reply to tweets and users based on a keyword search. All bundled nicely into a Tkinter GUI application.

node.name: Python-Stock
node.description: Predicting stock prices from Yahoo stock screener using scikit-learn and sending the predicitons via smtplib to a phone number.

node.name: Twitter-Data
node.description: A GUI window asks you for a keyword and sample size and analyses the sentiment of tweets about the keyword in a scatterplot.

node.name: News-Bias
node.description: This script will return the average subjectivity and polarity of 30 news articles from the news websites of your choice and then return the results in a terminal table.

node.name: react-sentence-tree
node.description: React component to create a constituency and dependency tree diagrams
